# mjml.text { #emailer_lib.mjml.text }

```python
mjml.text(content=None, **kwargs)
```

Create an MJML `<mj-text>` tag.

This is an ending tag that accepts text/HTML content but not MJML children.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**content**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [Optional\[str\]]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Text or HTML content for the tag

<code>[****kwargs**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [TagAttrValue]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [{}]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Tag attributes

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

<code>[]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [MJMLTag]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   MJMLTag object representing <mj-text>
